Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not sort the input numbers before checking if they are evenly spaced. This means that it will only return the correct result if the numbers are input in ascending order. Generated Test cases 1-16 (16/21) should pass the buggy code as they are in ascending order, while test cases 17-21 (5/21) should fail the buggy code as they are not in ascending order.
